about-section.title: About Me
about-section.description: I'm a Software Developer specialize on Front-End development. Not the sharpest tool in the shed, but I'm curious and a fast learner.

projects-section.title: Projects
projects-section.description: These are some of my projects:

projects.pokerpay: An app to calculate how to split the money between the players.
projects.t2: A TUI to track the time you spend on a project.
projects.limpify: An app to find people to clean your house (demo)
projects.codimage: An app that convert your code to an PNG image.
